Aggressive - Class in src.model
Aggressive: Computer player strategy that focuses on attack (reinforces its strongest country, then always attack with it until it cannot attack anymore, then fortifies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country).
Aggressive() - Constructor for class src.model.Aggressive
